name: Hundred Tower Eng
description:
A game in which you are a wizard who must kill the Demon King Anos but before killing him you must level up by killing watches and the 4 General of the Demon King. The monsters are spread over 100 Stage, you learn new fates as you level up and the maximum level is 100. By killing monsters you gain gold or equipment which allows you to improve your skills. Don't forget to do your quests that allow you to collect items and experience while following a story

A file with information on the equipment will be put (old version of the game)
